name: Move
description: The distance a unit can move in inches.

name: Weapon Skill
description: A unit's ability to hit in melee combat.

name: Ballistic Skill
description: A unit's ability to hit with ranged weapons.

name: Strength
description: A measure of a unit's physical power.

name: Wounds
description: The amount of damage a unit can take before being destroyed.

name: Attacks
description: The number of melee attacks a unit can make.

name: Leadership
description: A unit's ability to pass morale tests.

name: Save
description: The dice roll required to prevent damage.
